author: Dan Cancian
title: Several Countries Could Folllow Canada and Pull out of Tokyo 2020 Olympics Unless Games Are Postponed
description: The Canadian Olympic Committee said on Sunday it won't send its athletes to the Olympics if they're not postponed.
content:
The fate of the 2020 Olympic Games has been thrown in turmoil after Canada became the first country to warn it won't send its athletes to the Olympics, unless they are postponed by a year due to the coronavirus pandemic.
The games are scheduled to be held in… [+5121 chars]
